draw.overall_supervision_plan: RSO and OIC will orient soldiers to the training area before each event. The brief will include identifying Lane Graders and expectations. Evaluation format and expectations for each training event will be distributed before the event in order to emphasize execution. Every soldier is a safety and is responsible to help prevent injury (incentivize by not negatively affecting their scores).The training exercise will require watching soldiers physical ability and monitoring health during long physically demanding training.
